title: Loot chest bug
body: Combined 3 key fragments and opened a chest, only when I used the key it was consumed and the chest icon in the bottom left read 2/3 chests, like one was being opened. However, No chest was opened, and my interface was locked out from any interaction, clicking on the home button worked. and returning to the loot screen I had 2 chests and no key. I figured maybe it opened without the visual and I just don't know what I got or the resources were consumed without anything being granted. Thanks in advance :)

replies.body: It likely was an icon that got added automatically to your account from the chest.  Check in your purchase history and you can see it there.
It looks like you got the Rift Scuttler icon ^_^! If this happens in the future, make sure to check your transaction history for what you may have received!
I just had the same thing happen and theres nothing in my purchase history. Have had this happen on two accounts.... Really sucks.....
